meaningMnemonic: You give <radical>bamboo</radical> to <radical>someone</radical> and they make them into <kanji>chopsticks</kanji>. They are very talented at turning bamboo into bamboo chopsticks. This someone is an expert at their profession.
readingMnemonic: Now use those <kanji>chopsticks</kanji> to eat some delicious <reading>hash</reading> (はし) browns! That's what chopsticks were made for. That's what they're always made for.
